summary: Continuous gloss to psalter and canticles of Gallican version, written by possibly one hand ximed. Origin unknown (Ker 1957, p. 336).

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 1r) eadig | ƿer | se ne ferde on geþeahte arleasra

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 168r) ælc gast herað drihten

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 168v) Incipiunt cantinii in feria secunda

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 168v) canticum esiae prophete

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 168v) ic andette ðe drihten forðon þu yrsodest | me gecyrred is hatheortnys þin ˥ þu frefrodest me

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 168v) gefægna ˥ hera ƿunung forðon

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 168v) ii. feeiaiii. canticum ezechie regis iude

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 168v) ic gange to gatu on helle | ic sohte lafe geara minra

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 169v) drihten halne us do ˥ sealmas ure | ƿe syngað eallum dagum lifes ure | on huse drihtnes

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 169v) feriaiii. canticum annae

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 169v) fægnode heorte min on drihtne ˥ upa | hafen is heorte min on gode minum | tobræd is muð min ofer fynd mine | forðon ic blissode on hælo þine

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 170v) ˥ he selð | arleasra cyninge his ˥ gemærsað horn | cyninge his

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 170v) feriav. canticum moysi propheta

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 170v) uton singan drihtne ƿundorfullice soðlice | gemærsod is hors | ˥ astigend he aƿearp on sæ

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 172r) ˥ he inlædde | ofer hi drihten ƿæteru sæs | sunu soðlice israhela folces hi eodon | on drigum on middele his

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 172r) vi. canticum abbacuc propheta

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 172r) drihten ic gehyrde gehyrnysse þine ˥ ondred | drihtn ƿeore þin on middele | geara geliffæst þæt | on middele geara cuð þy dest þonne gram | ðu bist mildheortnysse þu gemunest

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 173v) ˥ ofer heahnysse mine he gelædeþ me | ofersƿiðe on sealmum syngende

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 173v) gehyr þu heofon þæt ic sprece

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 177r) ˥ ƿrace he afyldeð on feondum heora || ˥ miltrigende bið eorðan folces his

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 177r) bletsiað ealle ƿearc drihtnes drihtnes | heriað ˥ ofer blissiasð hine one ƿorulda

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 178r) þu gebletsod eart drihten on trumnysse heofonan | ˥ heriendluc ˥ ƿuldorfull ˥ ofer | upahafen on ƿorulda

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 178r ) sy gebletson drihten god forðon he neosode | ˥ he dyde alysednysse folces his

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 178v) þæt buton ege of of handa feonde | ura alysde ƿe ðeoƿian himfinal eleven line of gloss erased

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 178v) canticum sancte marie

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 178v) gemiclað saƿle min drihten

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 179r ) sƿa sƿa he sprecende is to fæderum urum | to abrahame ˥ to sæde his on ƿorulde

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 179r) ymnus sancti ambrosii episcopi

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 179r) þe god ƿe heriað þe drihten ƿe andettað

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 180r) on ðe ic gehihte ne beo ic gescynd on | ecnysse

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 180r) canticum Sancti Simeonis ad completorm

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 180r) nu forlæt þeoƿ þinne drihten || æfter ƿordum þinum on sibbe

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 180v) leoht to aƿrigennysse ðeoda | ˥ ƿuldor folces þines

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 180v) ˥ on eorðan sibb mid mannum godne ƿillan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 180v) mid þam halgum gaste on ƿuldre godes þæs fæder sy hit sƿa

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 180v) Oratio dominica secundum matheum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 180v) fæder ure þu ðe eart on heofonum ƿy gehalgod

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: incomplete, three leaves missing

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English and Latin

admin: Described by Owen Roberson with the assistance of Sanne van der Schee, with reference to published scholarship (2010; 2013).
